description:
Bryson is so dang adorable! He's about 5 foot 6 or 7, and almost 19 years old (yeah, I know he looks young!)
He says he has had a hard life, basically raising himself, and been on his own since 16. Since he had to take care of himself, he had to work full time, so had to drop out of school.
That didn't stop him from getting an education. While working full-time, he got his GED and is already enrolled and going to classes at a local community college. So yep, you're memberships are paying for his tuition. And you didn't think hedonism could be altruistic.
He's a sweet kid who flies by the seat of his pants and I suspect he will try anything once.
Bryson also seems to have a lot of cute friends, so I am gonna try to get them to come on in and show their stuff off.
title: Bryson - Solo
